headline.main: Chronic-Disease Services Will Be Expanded by City

headline.main: RESEARCH AWARDS; Studies on Pituitary and Typhoid Treatment Are Recognized Chemical Structure Mysteries Solved Growth Hormone Outstanding Research

docs.abstract: W L Laurence comment on Dr Li research for which he got Lasker Med Research Award (Nov 15); diagram
docs.lead_paragraph: The first Albert Lasker Medical Research Awards of $10,000 each, established in May, 1962, by the Albert and Mary Lasker Foundation, were presented last week to two scientists for outstanding contributions in basic and clinical research.
docs.snippet: The first Albert Lasker Medical Research Awards of $10,000 each, established in May, 1962, by the Albert and Mary Lasker Foundation, were presented last week to two scientists for outstanding contributions in basic and clinical research.
